com.datastax.oss.dsbulk.format.statement

Class StatementFormatterLimits

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datastax.oss.dsbulk.format.statement.StatementFormatterLimits

  • public final class StatementFormatterLimits
extends Object
    A set of user-defined limitation rules that printers should strive to comply with when formatting statements.

    Limits defined in this class should be considered on a per-statement basis; i.e. if the maximum query string length is 100 and the statement to format is a BatchStatement with 5 inner statements, each inner statement should be allowed to print a maximum of 100 characters of its query string.

    This class is NOT thread-safe.
